entries.name: Umami
entries.title: Web App
entries.description: Don't you hate it when you forget those awesome restaurants you've always wanted to go to? So do we. We here at Umami created this web app to keep track of all of the restaurants we want to go to sometime in the future. We love our food, dude.

entries.name: Avi Bagla
entries.title: Vegan Pizza
entries.description: Avi loves to eat. Give him a bowl of nails, and he'll find a way to eat it and enjoy it. Avi probably has too many restaurants on his wishlist. He's too hungry.
entries.caption: The dog was interviewed after. He said he liked it.

entries.name: Ashley Ngu
entries.title: Gourmet Pickles
entries.description: Ash loves good food. And mochi.
entries.caption: #nofilter

entries.name: Vishesh Gupta
entries.title: Spinach Samosas
entries.description: Vishesh is smart. Like, super smart. Ask him about topology and he'll blow your mind. Give him a bowl of lentils and he's happy.
entries.caption: Have you heard of topology? Really? WHAT? No. No. I can't even.

entries.name: Have feedback?
entries.description: Do you have any questions, comments, or feedback? Or do you just need a friend to talk to? Email Avi at avi@avibagla.com
